name: Chaotic Metal
four_piece_effect: The equipper's CRIT DMG increases by 20%. When any character in the squad triggers <color=#FE437E>Corruption's</color> additional DMG, this effect further increases by 5.5% for 8s, stacking up to 6 times. Repeated triggers reset the duration.
story: A Drive Disc burned with specialized Ether technology offering personalized attribute amplification to the user.
